title: Constant 'waiting for stats'
body: After most games I get 'waiting for stats' followed by 'trying to reconnect'. also get trying to reconnect after messing with runes or masteries and have to do them several times. My net isn't the greatest but never had this problem with old client and always had this problem with new client even when it was in beta.

replies.body: Hmmmmm if that's happening even when you're just reorganizing your runes, it sounds like your network might be having a really hard time keeping it's connection for some reason. Let's try updating a few of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in case something there isn't configured in the best way for League to run. Let me know if that doesn't help!

Got any links to sites that work with chrome? I can't use any of those packet loss or buffering sites linked. Though I did try other sites and no packet loss issues. Also configured the dns and flushed it.  Don't have peer downloading for windows 10. I don't have access to get into my modem/router to do port forwarding. Tried disabling firewall. My game ping is usually around 100ms due to my less than awesome internet and distance from NA server but like I said I NEVER had this problem on the old client and I don't have any problems when I'm actually in a match.

Hmmmmm I'm not sure why that packet loss site wouldn't work in Chrome, since that's what I use here and just pulled it up myself =\ . Those disconnects could actually be some packet loss. Try using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to check again, and take a screenshot using something like Gyazo so I can take a look at it as well.

http://prntscr.com/fh5pck

Apparently I had some high ping last game(didn't notice it?) and  0.26% packet loss. After last game it again popped up with waiting for stats and shortly after attempting to reconnect after which it reconnected but still went back to waiting for stats.

That packet loss getting up to about 1.5% could actually be enough to cause those reconnect problems. Hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and send them the network logs you used in that log reader. They can look deeper through those logs and see what they can do to help!
